template.template: Template Server DELL PowerEdge R820 by HTTP
template.name: Template Server DELL PowerEdge R820 by HTTP
template.description:
Template for DELL PowerEdge R820 servers with iDRAC version 7 and later and RESTful API enabled.
Template tooling version used: 0.38

item.name: Dell R820: Firmware version
item.description: This attribute defines the firmware version of a remote access card.

trigger.name: Dell R820: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Firmware version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: Dell R820: Hardware model name
item.description: This attribute defines the model name of the system.

item.name: Dell R820: Hardware serial number
item.description: This attribute defines the service tag of the system.

trigger.name: Dell R820: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

item.name: Dell R820: Overall system health status
item.description: This attribute defines the overall rollup status of all components in the system being monitored by the remote access card. Includes system, storage, IO devices, iDRAC, CPU, memory, etc.

trigger.name: Dell R820: System is in unrecoverable state
trigger.description: Please check the device for faults.

trigger.name: Dell R820: System status is in critical state
trigger.description: Please check the device for errors.

trigger.name: Dell R820: System status is in warning state
trigger.description: Please check the device for warnings.

dependency.name: Dell R820: System status is in critical state

item.name: Get system
item.description: Returns the metrics of a system.

discovery_rule.name: Array controller cache discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of a cache of disk array controllers.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#BATTERY_NAME} Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the job. Possible value: OK, Warning, Critical.

trigger_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#BATTERY_NAME} is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the device for faults.

trigger_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#BATTERY_NAME} is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the device for faults.

dependency.name: Dell R820: {#BATTERY_NAME} is in critical state

trigger_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#BATTERY_NAME} is not in optimal state
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the device for faults.

dependency.name: Dell R820: {#BATTERY_NAME} is in critical state
Dell R820: {#BATTERY_NAME} is in warning state

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#CNTLR_NAME} Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the job. Possible value: OK, Warning, Critical.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#SENSOR_NAME} Get sensor
item_prototype.description: Returns the metrics of a sensor.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#SENSOR_NAME} Status
item_prototype.description: The sensor value.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#SENSOR_NAME} Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the job. Possible value: OK, Warning, Critical.

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: The NetworkInterface schema describes links to the NetworkAdapter and represents the functionality available to the containing system.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#NETIF} Get interface
item_prototype.description: Returns the metrics of a network interface.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#NETIF} Health
item_prototype.description: The status of the job. Possible value: OK, Warning, Critical.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#NETIF} Speed
item_prototype.description: Network port current link speed.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#NETIF} State
item_prototype.description: The known state of the Resource, such as, enabled. Possible value: Enabled, Disabled, StandbyOffline, StandbySpare, InTest, Starting, Absent, UnavailableOffline, Deferring, Quiesced, Updating, Qualified.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#NETIF} Link status
item_prototype.description: The status of the link between this port and its link partner. Possible value: Down, Up, null.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Get disk
item_prototype.description: Returns the metrics of a physical disk.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Media type
item_prototype.description: The type of media contained in this drive. Possible value: HDD, SSD, SMR, null.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Model name
item_prototype.description: The model number for the drive.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Serial number
item_prototype.description: The serial number for this drive.

trigger_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger_prototype.description: {#DISK_NAME} serial number has changed. Ack to close

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Size
item_prototype.description: The size, in bytes, of this drive.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the job. Possible value: OK, Warning, Critical.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#SENSOR_NAME} Get sensor
item_prototype.description: Returns the metrics of a sensor.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#SENSOR_NAME} Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the job. Possible value: OK, Warning, Critical.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#SENSOR_NAME} Get sensor
item_prototype.description: Returns the metrics of a sensor.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#SENSOR_NAME} Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the job. Possible value: OK, Warning, Critical.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#SENSOR_NAME} Value
item_prototype.description: The sensor value.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Get disk
item_prototype.description: Returns the metrics of a virtual disk.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Layout type
item_prototype.description: The RAID type of this volume. Possible value: RAID0, RAID1, RAID3, RAID4, RAID5, RAID6, RAID10, RAID01, RAID6TP, RAID1E, RAID50, RAID60, RAID00, RAID10E, RAID1Triple, RAID10Triple.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Read policy
item_prototype.description: Indicates the read cache policy setting for the Volume. Possible value: ReadAhead, AdaptiveReadAhead, Off.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Size
item_prototype.description: The size in bytes of this Volume.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Current state
item_prototype.description: The known state of the Resource, such as, enabled. Possible value: Enabled, Disabled, StandbyOffline, StandbySpare, InTest, Starting, Absent, UnavailableOffline, Deferring, Quiesced, Updating, Qualified.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the job. Possible value: OK, Warning, Critical.

item_prototype.name: Dell R820: {#DISK_NAME} Write policy
item_prototype.description: Indicates the write cache policy setting for the Volume. Possible value: WriteThrough, ProtectedWriteBack, UnprotectedWriteBack.

macro.description: The Dell iDRAC user password.
The Dell iDRAC Redfish API URL in the format `<scheme>://<host>:<port>`.
The Dell iDRAC username.
The critical status of the disk array cache battery for trigger expression.
The OK status of the disk array cache battery for trigger expression.
The warning status of the disk array cache battery for trigger expression.
The critical status of the disk array for trigger expression.
The disaster status of the disk array for trigger expression.
The warning status of the disk array for trigger expression.
The critical S.M.A.R.T status of the disk for trigger expression.
The critical status of the disk for trigger expression.
The critical status of the disk for trigger expression.
The warning status of the disk for trigger expression.
The critical value of the FAN sensor for trigger expression.
The critical value of the FAN sensor for trigger expression.
The critical value of the FAN sensor for trigger expression.
The critical value of the FAN sensor for trigger expression.
The critical value of the FAN sensor for trigger expression.
The warning value of the FAN sensor for trigger expression.
The warning value of the FAN sensor for trigger expression.
The critical status of the health for trigger expression.
The disaster status of the health for trigger expression.
The warning status of the health for trigger expression.
The critical value of the PSU sensor for trigger expression.
The critical value of the PSU sensor for trigger expression.
The warning value of the PSU sensor for trigger expression.
The critical status of the temperature probe for trigger expression.
The critical status of the temperature probe for trigger expression.
The critical status of the temperature probe for trigger expression.
The critical status of the temperature probe for trigger expression.
The OK status of the temperature probe for trigger expression.
The warning status of the temperature probe for trigger expression.
The warning status of the temperature probe for trigger expression.
The time interval for SNMP agent availability trigger expression.
The critical status of the virtual disk for trigger expression.
The warning status of the virtual disk for trigger expression.
